document_data.name: Elthaun Aumar
document_data.mainbody: '''Elthaun Aumar''' was the second of the Warring Princes of [[Athalantar]].
document_data.History:
Elthaun was the second son of the Stag King of Athalantar, [[Uthgrael Aumar]]. He was a subtle manipulator.

He fled the country for [[Calimshan]] in [[219 DR]]. Later that year, [[Belaur Aumar]]'s [[magelord]]s found and killed him.
